Expected Result: The Welcome Back screen is shown.

The Ether balance is shown on the overview.
The wallet address is shown on the overview.
The selected network is Ethereum Mainnet.

Test Steps: Switch networks to a test network.
Expected Result:
The Sepolia balance is shown on the overview.
The wallet address is shown on the overview.
The selected network is Sepolia.

Test Steps: Open the test dapp in another tab.
In test dapp, click "create token" to deploy the Token contract.
Confirm the transaction and wait for it to complete.
Switch to the wallet and open the activity list item.
Expected Result: "Contract deployment" item is shown in list item. The transaction status, nonce, amount, gas and total are shown in the item details.

Test Steps: Proceed to view the transaction on the block explorer.
Expected Result: The block explorer opens in a new tab.

Test Steps: In test dapp, proceed to transfer token.
Expected Result: In confirmation notification screen, the title is shown as "Send TST". The recipient's hexadecimal address is shown as . The amount is shown. The estimated gas details are shown. The total amount is shown.
The transaction "Send TST" appears in the activity list. The recipient's hexadecimal address is shown in the activity list item. The amount is shown in the activity list item.
The transaction status, recipient's address, nonce, amount, gas and total are shown in the item details.
The created, submitted and confirmed activity is shown in the activity log.

Test Steps: Proceed to view the transaction on the block explorer.
Expected Result: The block explorer opens in a new tab.
